DataElement.preferredDefinition: The count or number related to the patients visits to a physical therapist.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._An individual trained and certified to apply knowledge of the concepts, principles, and practices of physical therapy for the treatment or prevention of physical disability or disease. Physical therapist plans and carries out treatment utilizing therapeutic exercise, massage, and physical agents such as air, water, electricity, sound, and radiant energy; performs tests and measurements involving manual or electrical means; and interpret results. Therapist also devises adaptations of equipment to meet the specific needs of patients._The act of going to see some person or place or thing; it can cover a short or long period but refers to a non-permanent arrangement.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Therapist also devises adaptations of equipment to meet the specific needs of patients.:The act of going to see some person or place or thing; it can cover a short or long period but refers to a non-permanent arrangement.

Concepts.definition: An individual trained and certified to apply knowledge of the concepts, principles, and practices of physical therapy for the treatment or prevention of physical disability or disease. Physical therapist plans and carries out treatment utilizing therapeutic exercise, massage, and physical agents such as air, water, electricity, sound, and radiant energy; performs tests and measurements involving manual or electrical means; and interpret results. Therapist also devises adaptations of equipment to meet the specific needs of patients.
The act of going to see some person or place or thing; it can cover a short or long period but refers to a non-permanent arrangement.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The quantity of the specified item.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.
